## Supporting Types



<h4 id="schematype">Schema<wbr>Type</h4>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}

    <dd>TYPE_UNSPECIFIED{{% md %}}Default value. This value is unused.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt>Protocol<wbr>Buffer</dt>

    <dd>AVRO{{% md %}}An Avro schema definition.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
